Activity: Wake up, prepare for work. Listen to music.
Continue working on the assigned task, focusing on implementing the core functionality. Write clean, well-documented code.
If character model is needed. Check the response from @3dmod-1 and discuss with them if there is any problem or additional requirement for the character model.
Lunch break. Try a new recipe at home.
Address any questions or feedback from code reviews. Refactor code as needed to improve readability and maintainability.
Test the implemented functionality thoroughly, identifying and fixing any bugs or issues that arise. Document testing procedures and results.
Browse some game development resources and communities online for interesting topics, and read some articles about Unreal Engine.
Save work, update task management system. Prepare for tomorrow. Head home.
